movies.name: Ragnarok
movies.overview: In a Norwegian town poisoned by pollution and rattled by melting glaciers, the end times feel all too real. Only a legendary hero can stop an ancient evill.

movies.name: Five Feet Apart
movies.overview: Two teenagers with cystic fibrosis meet in a hospital and fall in love, but their disease means they must avoid close physical contactsss.

movies.name: The Walking Dead
movies.overview: In the wake of a zombie apocalypse, survivors struggle to stay alive and adapt in a world overrun by the undead.

movies.name: Ava
movies.overview: A deadly assassin named Ava works for a black ops organization, traveling the globe specializing in high-profile hits. When a job goes dangerously wrong, she is forced to fight for her own survival.

movies.name: Extraction
movies.overview: A fearless black market mercenary embarks on the most deadly extraction of his career when he's enlisted to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord.

movies.name: Rick and Morty
movies.overview: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson as they explore the universe.

movies.name: See
movies.overview: In a future where humankind has lost the ability to see, society has found new ways to interact, build, hunt, and survive. That is until a set of twins is born with the ability to see.

movies.name: Machine Gun Preacher
movies.overview: Sam Childers, a former drug-dealing biker, finds God and becomes a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.

movies.name: Outside the Wire
movies.overview: In the near future, a drone pilot is sent into a deadly militarized zone and must work with an android officer to locate a doomsday device.

movies.name: Sweet Tooth
movies.overview: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

movies.name: Blue Miracle
movies.overview: To save their orphanage, a guardian and his kids partner with a washed-up boat captain for a chance to win a lucrative fishing competition.
